title: Quake
description:
From the first moment I saw Janny Moore's sparkling eyes and luminous smile, I've been obsessed with the idea of getting to know her... watching.  She's everything I need in my life, now I just have to convince her. She's never set eyes on me, she has no idea I exist... but she will.
Librarian Note: This book is Part 1 of a series and ends with a cliffhanger. The next book is 'Quiver'.
author: Jacob Chance
